name: error

properties.name: code
properties.description: Error code; subject to future changes. If the error code is 406, the error message must not be processed in any way and must not be displayed to the user

properties.name: message
properties.description: Error message; subject to future changes

description: An object of this type can be returned on every function call, in case of an error

name: ok
description: An object of this type is returned on a successful function call for certain functions

name: tdlibParameters

properties.name: use_test_dc
properties.description: If set to true, the Telegram test environment will be used instead of the production environment

properties.name: use_secret_chats
properties.description: If set to true, support for secret chats will be enabled

properties.name: api_hash
properties.description: Application identifier hash for Telegram API access, which can be obtained at https://my.telegram.org

properties.name: api_id
properties.description: Application identifier for Telegram API access, which can be obtained at https://my.telegram.org

properties.name: database_directory
properties.description: The path to the directory for the persistent database; if empty, the current working directory will be used

properties.name: use_chat_info_database
properties.description: If set to true, the library will maintain a cache of users, basic groups, supergroups, channels and secret chats. Implies use_file_database

properties.name: use_message_database
properties.description: If set to true, the library will maintain a cache of chats and messages. Implies use_chat_info_database

properties.name: system_version
properties.description: Version of the operating system the application is being run on; must be non-empty

properties.name: application_version
properties.description: Application version; must be non-empty

properties.name: files_directory
properties.description: The path to the directory for storing files; if empty, database_directory will be used

properties.name: use_file_database
properties.description: If set to true, information about downloaded and uploaded files will be saved between application restarts

properties.name: system_language_code
properties.description: IETF language tag of the user's operating system language; must be non-empty

properties.name: device_model
properties.description: Model of the device the application is being run on; must be non-empty

properties.name: enable_storage_optimizer
properties.description: If set to true, old files will automatically be deleted

properties.name: ignore_file_names
properties.description: If set to true, original file names will be ignored. Otherwise, downloaded files will be saved under names as close as possible to the original name

description: Contains parameters for TDLib initialization

name: authenticationCodeTypeCall

description: The user has been authorized, but needs to enter a password to start using the application

description: The user has been successfully authorized. TDLib is now ready to answer queries

name: authorizationStateLoggingOut
description: The user is currently logging out

name: authorizationStateClosing
description: TDLib is closing, all subsequent queries will be answered with the error 500. Note that closing TDLib can take a while. All resources will be freed only after authorizationStateClosed has been received

name: localFile

properties.description: True, if it is possible to try to download or generate the file

properties.name: can_be_deleted
properties.description: True, if the file can be deleted

properties.description: True, if the file is currently being downloaded (or a local copy is being generated by some other means)

properties.name: is_downloading_completed
properties.description: True, if the local copy is fully available

properties.name: downloaded_prefix_size
properties.description: If is_downloading_completed is false, then only some prefix of the file is ready to be read. downloaded_prefix_size is the size of that prefix

properties.description: Total downloaded file bytes. Should be used only for calculating download progress. The actual file size may be bigger, and some parts of it may contain garbage

name: remoteFile

properties.name: id
properties.description: Remote file identifier, may be empty. Can be used across application restarts or even from other devices for the current user. If the ID starts with "http://" or "https://", it represents the HTTP URL of the file. TDLib is currently unable to download files if only their URL is known.

properties.name: is_uploading_active
properties.description: True, if the file is currently being uploaded (or a remote copy is being generated by some other means)

properties.name: is_uploading_completed
properties.description: True, if a remote copy is fully available

properties.name: uploaded_size
properties.description: Size of the remote available part of the file; 0 if unknown

description: Represents a remote file

Unlike supergroups, channels can have an unlimited number of subscribers

This is a string of 36 bytes, which must be used to make a 12x12 square image with a color depth of 4. name: getAuthorizationState
description: Returns the current authorization state; this is an offline request. For informational purposes only. Use updateAuthorizationState instead to maintain the current authorization state

name: setTdlibParameters

properties.name: parameters
properties.description: Parameters

description: Sets the parameters for TDLib initialization. Works only when the current authorization state is authorizationStateWaitTdlibParameters

name: checkDatabaseEncryptionKey

properties.name: encryption_key
properties.description: Encryption key to check or set up

description: Checks the database encryption key for correctness. Works only when the current authorization state is authorizationStateWaitEncryptionKey

name: setAuthenticationPhoneNumber

properties.name: phone_number
properties.description: The phone number of the user, in international format

properties.name: allow_flash_call
properties.description: Pass true if the authentication code may be sent via flash call to the specified phone number

properties.name: is_current_phone_number
properties.description: Pass true if the phone number is used on the current device. Ignored if allow_flash_call is false

description: Sets the phone number of the user and sends an authentication code to the user. Works only when the current authorization state is authorizationStateWaitPhoneNumber

name: resendAuthenticationCode
description: Re-sends an authentication code to the user. Works only when the current authorization state is authorizationStateWaitCode and the next_code_type of the result is not null

name: checkAuthenticationCode

properties.name: code
properties.description: The verification code received via SMS, Telegram message, phone call, or flash call

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: If the user is not yet registered, the first name of the user; 1-255 characters

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: If the user is not yet registered; the last name of the user; optional; 0-255 characters

description: Checks the authentication code. Works only when the current authorization state is authorizationStateWaitCode

name: checkAuthenticationPassword

properties.name: password
properties.description: The password to check

description: Checks the authentication password for correctness. Works only when the current authorization state is authorizationStateWaitPassword

name: requestAuthenticationPasswordRecovery
description: Requests to send a password recovery code to an email address that was previously set up. Works only when the current authorization state is authorizationStateWaitPassword

name: recoverAuthenticationPassword

properties.name: recovery_code
properties.description: Recovery code to check

description: Recovers the password with a password recovery code sent to an email address that was previously set up. Works only when the current authorization state is authorizationStateWaitPassword

name: checkAuthenticationBotToken

properties.name: token
properties.description: The bot token

description: Checks the authentication token of a bot; to log in as a bot. Works only when the current authorization state is authorizationStateWaitPhoneNumber. Can be used instead of setAuthenticationPhoneNumber and checkAuthenticationCode to log in

name: logOut
description: Closes the TDLib instance after a proper logout. Requires an available network connection. All local data will be destroyed. After the logout completes, updateAuthorizationState with authorizationStateClosed will be sent

name: close
description: Closes the TDLib instance. All databases will be flushed to disk and properly closed. After the close completes, updateAuthorizationState with authorizationStateClosed will be sent

name: destroy
description: Closes the TDLib instance, destroying all local data without a proper logout. The current user session will remain in the list of all active sessions. All local data will be destroyed. After the destruction completes updateAuthorizationState with authorizationStateClosed will be sent

name: setDatabaseEncryptionKey

properties.name: new_encryption_key
properties.description: New encryption key

description: Changes the database encryption key. Usually the encryption key is never changed and is stored in some OS keychain

name: getPasswordState
description: Returns the current state of 2-step verification

name: setPassword

properties.name: old_password
properties.description: Previous password of the user

properties.name: new_password
properties.description: New password of the user; may be empty to remove the password

properties.name: new_hint
properties.description: New password hint; may be empty

properties.name: set_recovery_email_address
properties.description: Pass true if the recovery email address should be changed

properties.name: new_recovery_email_address
properties.description: New recovery email address; may be empty

description: Changes the password for the user. If a new recovery email address is specified, then the error EMAIL_UNCONFIRMED is returned and the password change will not be applied until the new recovery email address has been confirmed. The application should periodically call getPasswordState to check whether the new email address has been confirmed

name: getRecoveryEmailAddress

properties.name: password
properties.description: The password for the current user

description: Returns a recovery email address that was previously set up. This method can be used to verify a password provided by the user

name: setRecoveryEmailAddress
description: Changes the recovery email address of the user. If a new recovery email address is specified, then the error EMAIL_UNCONFIRMED is returned and the email address will not be changed until the new email has been confirmed. The application should periodically call getPasswordState to check whether the email address has been confirmed.

name: requestPasswordRecovery
description: Requests to send a password recovery code to an email address that was previously set up

name: recoverPassword

properties.name: recovery_code
properties.description: Recovery code to check

description: Recovers the password using a recovery code sent to an email address that was previously set up

name: searchPublicChat

properties.name: username
properties.description: Username to be resolved

description: Searches a public chat by its username. Currently only private chats, supergroups and channels can be public. Returns the chat if found; otherwise an error is returned

name: searchPublicChats

properties.name: query
properties.description: Query to search for

description: Searches public chats by looking for specified query in their username and title. Currently only private chats, supergroups and channels can be public. Returns a meaningful number of results. Returns nothing if the length of the searched username prefix is less than 5. Excludes private chats with contacts and chats from the chat list from the results

name: searchChats
